testcase.name: beforeClass

failure.message:
Don't know how to encode {"id":"1","category":{"id":1,"name":"cats"},"name":"Kitty","photoUrls":null,"tags":null,"status":"available"} as a byte stream.
Please use EncoderConfig (EncoderConfig#encodeContentTypeAs) to specify how to serialize data for this content-type. For example: "given().config(RestAssured.config().encoderConfig(encoderConfig().encodeContentTypeAs("JSON", ContentType.TEXT))). .."

testcase.failure:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Don't know how to encode {"id":"1","category":{"id":1,"name":"cats"},"name":"Kitty","photoUrls":null,"tags":null,"status":"available"} as a byte stream.
Please use EncoderConfig (EncoderConfig#encodeContentTypeAs) to specify how to serialize data for this content-type. For example: "given().config(RestAssured.config().encoderConfig(encoderConfig().encodeContentTypeAs("JSON", ContentType.TEXT))). .."
